CHAT.comment: THOMAS C. HORNE, SUPERINTENDENT, ARIZONA PUBLIC INSTRUCTION, Petitioner v. MIRIAM FLORES, ET AL.; and SPEAKER OF THE ARIZONA HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Petitioner v. MIRIAM FLORES, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF KENNETH W. STARR ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SRI SRINIVASAN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF NICOLE A. SAHARSKY OF BEHALF OF UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF KENNETH W. STARR ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:09 p.m., the case in above-entitled matter was submitted.)
